SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GETSUFFIXGUID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the Guid of the suffix
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GETSUFFIXGUID(@SUFFIX nvarchar(100)) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @RESULT uniqueidentifier
SELECT @RESULT = sc.ID FROM dbo.SUFFIXCODE sc WHERE sc.DESCRIPTION = @SUFFIX
return @RESULT end
